text: Hey … do any of you know how to add a form inside a custom module and still keep the form editable? I mean the user should be able to choose to redirect or show message, change email address … like a normal form module?
We do that using an actual form widget module and we place the defaul t form with the form ID

Hi everyone, I've got a hubl templating question I'm hoping to get some help with.  I want to show a group of 4 posts, each from a different category, displayed in order of date published.  The issue I'm having is that the "sort" filter is causing hubl errors, but other filters like "shuffle" seem to work as expected.  Code snippet on the way....
<@U3U3AMUBE|clnmcgrw> uploaded a file: <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/files/clnmcgrw/F49L03HML/hubl_sort_filter_issue.html|Hubl sort filter issue>

Does anyone know if its possible to assign a number to a custom module. This way when the  module is used more than once on a page, they can identify it easily? For example, I have a custom module that has a flexible column in it. I added the label "Custom Module" to the widget container and when they load up this custom module on the template level multiple times, it is quite confusing as 1) there is no distinction (except when hovering) which module is which 2) the order in the edit modules menu is not the correct order
That’s how I used to do it … but at the page level there’s no way to change from redirect to show thank you or add/remove email addresses
and then use if statements to modify soem of them

<@U2H3TT8F2|ajlaporte> uploaded a file: <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/files/ajlaporte/F488PJJKA/pasted_image_at_2017_02_22_11_49_am.png|Pasted image at 2017 02 22 11 49 AM> and commented: Here is an image showing the confusion I am having

<@U3UGBHY31> pinned ’s HTML <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/files/U3U3AMUBE/F49L03HML/hubl_sort_filter_issue.html|Hubl sort filter issue> to this channel.

Hey everybody. My website is on the HubSpot COS. I recently activate SSL on it. On my Provider I created a redirection from “<http://ideagency.fr|ideagency.fr>" to “<http://www.ideagency.fr|www.ideagency.fr>". But since my activation I have a pb with the non-www version “<https://ideagency.fr>” that send a http error. Is there anybody that already has this error and could help me ? It’s bad for my SEO. Thanks a lot !
